alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:49PM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 4 to 8 inches. Up to 15 inches over the highest peaks. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Coastal Range, Burney Basin and Shasta County Mountains above 3000 feet including portions of Interstate 5. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will be at 2500-3500 feet Friday night rising to 3000-6000 feet Saturday morning. Heaviest amounts expected above 3000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
